channel.title: Need help bad!
channel.description: i found ::master on client.java on my server den i downloaded satan isle v.1 and i wanted any person 2 do ::satantrain but der was no client.java der was client.class so can anyone tell me were i can find the command satantrain and change it 2 every1 2 do it plz help

item.title: Need help bad!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Andy Mod Andy
item.description:
@Mod_Andy wrote:

… You Can add Satantrain on Any Server … Just Do What I Told You :

[quote=“Mod Andy, post:4, topic:131265”][quote author=b bob0 link=topic=181964.msg1659453#msg1659453 date=1186543498]
if i send u the download can u do it for me? or find the place for commands plzzzzzz
[/quote]
Like I said Search

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

Then after the Next } Then Add :

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("satantrain") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(999999999, 0); addSkillXP(999999999, 1); addSkillXP(999999999, 2); addSkillXP(999999999, 3); addSkillXP(999999999, 4); addSkillXP(999999999, 5); addSkillXP(999999999, 6); addSkillXP(999999999, 7); addSkillXP(999999999, 8); addSkillXP(999999999, 9); addSkillXP(999999999, 10); addSkillXP(999999999, 11); addSkillXP(999999999, 12); addSkillXP(999999999, 13); addSkillXP(999999999, 14); addSkillXP(999999999, 15); addSkillXP(999999999, 16); addSkillXP(999999999, 17); addSkillXP(999999999, 18); addSkillXP(999999999, 19); addSkillXP(999999999, 20); addSkillXP(999999999, 21); addSkillXP(999999999, 22); addSkillXP(999999999, 23); addSkillXP(999999999, 24); sendMessage("MESSAGE HERE."); }
Change the Message in the “MESSAGE HERE”

Compile and Run :)[/quote]

Read full topic
